foundry street denizen.name: Foundry Street Denizen
foundry street denizen.text: Whenever another red creature enters the battlefield under your control, Foundry Street Denizen gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

goblin shortcutter.name: Goblin Shortcutter
goblin shortcutter.text: When Goblin Shortcutter enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

gore-house chainwalker.name: Gore-House Chainwalker
gore-house chainwalker.text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

skinbrand goblin.name: Skinbrand Goblin
skinbrand goblin.text: Bloodrush — {R}, Discard Skinbrand Goblin: Target attacking creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

viashino firstblade.name: Viashino Firstblade
viashino firstblade.text:
Haste
When Viashino Firstblade enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

wojek halberdiers.name: Wojek Halberdiers
wojek halberdiers.text: Battalion — Whenever Wojek Halberdiers and at least two other creatures attack, Wojek Halberdiers gains first strike until end of turn.

madcap skills.name: Madcap Skills
madcap skills.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has menace.

pacifism.name: Pacifism
pacifism.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

dynacharge.name: Dynacharge
dynacharge.text:
Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

lightning strike.name: Lightning Strike
lightning strike.text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

shock.name: Shock
shock.text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

boros guildgate.name: Boros Guildgate
boros guildgate.text:
Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
